q: How do I book an appointment?
a: Online booking will open soon. Join the email list to be notified and access launch‑week perks.
We're located in Fort Lauderdale, FL, and we service all of South Florida. Parking is available on-site. Hours are by appointment only—check the scheduler for availability.

Cancellations made 72+ hours before your appointment receive a full refund (minus processing fee). Cancellations within 48–72 hours receive a 50% refund. Cancellations within 24 hours receive no refund, but you'll receive 25% off your next service (up to 50% of the cancelled service value). No-shows are treated the same as 24-hour cancellations. If you arrive late, your appointment time may be shortened depending on schedule availability.

q: I'm on acne medication—can I be treated?
a: Some services are not appropriate while using isotretinoin or certain topicals. Please share your current routine and medications during intake—Amy will advise safe options.
